creditline: Gift of Mrs. Philip Little, Jr.
description: pair of crystal candelabra, Waterford type; vase-shaped stem terminating in long, cut spire topped with an acorn finial; five notched arms, two of them fitted with candle sockets, spring from different levels; arms are joined to shaft by swags of pear-shaped pendants; missing top finial and other pieces; breaks apart into pieces (not numbered); not secure
title: Candelabra, One of a Pair
